about_the_game:
Are you ready for an exciting journey through with Mo and Fro? You’ll take on various levels all across a platitude of worlds. There's no task too dangerous or strange for this busy team of go-getters... unless you play with friends and families! Achieve record times! Solve challenging puzzles and have a blast with your partner in crime! We're stronger when connected.

Master unique and connected character abilities at every new level. Help each other across an abundance of unexpected obstacles and laugh-out-loud moments.

Co-op!!

Invite a friend to join with Remote Play Together**, and experience a thrilling adventure built purely for two. Choose from couch or online co-op with shared-screen play, and face ever-changing challenges where working and being connected is the only way forward.

Key Features

  • You need to be close and help each other clear a level.

    Character Abilities

  • Mo can Use Burrows.

  • Mo can move blocks so that Fro can jump over.

  • Fro can pick up objects to clear obstacles.

World Mechanics

Experience different worlds, each with its own set of mechanics you must navigate through with your partner, will you be able to clear them?

New Game Plus

After completing each world, you unlock an extra set of levels to play through with additional features included like a timer!

short_description: Mo n Fro is a 2 Player chaotic couch co-op puzzle game that sees players tethered together to complete different levels. Working as a team, Mo and Fro must evaluate and solve each level using their abilities and the world mechanics before the time runs out!
